item.title: This One Trick Will Change the Way You Print Screen on Your Windows 7 HP Laptop!
item.description: Introduction Printing screen on Windows 7 HP laptops can be a hassle. But with this one trick, you can make your life easier and take screenshots with ease. In this blog post, weâ€™ll discuss the definition of Print Screen, the benefits of using this trick, and a step-by-step guide on how to enable the Snipping Tool and set preferences. Definition of Print Screen Print Screen is a button on a computer keyboard that takes a snapshot of the entire screen and saves it to the clipboard.
